title: The Zombie She Carried
description: Still reeling from her first-ever one-night-stand, Grace Aubrey crashes headlong into the arms of the most gorgeous man she's ever seen: billionaire doctor Victor Vladimirovich Lazarev. She doesn't expect the arrogant star researcher to spare her a second glance, but he can't seem to keep his eyes off the pretty young teacher. Will he be repelled when she confesses her secret? She can't keep it quiet for long--soon she'll be sporting a zombie baby bump...
author: Cate Marsden
